Posts.Content: Jun 17, 2008 09:59PM - edited Jun 17, 2008 10:03PM by susan5783 I finished chemo (taxotere, carboplating and herceptin)  one month ago and am seeing no signs of any hair growth except for some thin white fuzz that I have had all along and that  resembles a brillo pad.   it's pretty discouraging.  Also about 1/2 of my eyelashes fell out after the last chemo.  was hoping I could ditch my wig soon, since it is getting so hot, but I'm not brave enough to be bald in public.   I also started Herceptin and was wondering if that might be slowing the hair growth.    dx 12/22/07, Stage 1, Grade 3, 1.2 cm.  ER+, HER2+
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Jun 27, 2008 11:50AM - edited Jun 27, 2008 11:51AM by susan5783 I lost most of my eyelashes AFTER my last treatment (TCH) which was May 15. that was a shock, since I assumed that would not happen.  They still look very sparse.   I have not seen any re-growth since then, which worries me.  My hair, what there is of it, is like dandelion fluff. I am now receiving Herceptin and taking Arimidex and wonder if either of these two drugs is delaying the re-growth.  dx 12/22/07 1.1cm. ER+, HER2+
